title: Need help identifying logo font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131115040450im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lingua_4427.jpg)

I need some help identifying the font used in this logo. The company I work for recently bought over this company, but for some reason they didn't give us a vector or high-res version of the logo, so I'm trying to recreate it.  
Ran it through WhatTheFont but no luck.  
Thanks in advance and I appreciate the help.
author: mktn127
